column1: '''''Der Kleine Hobbit''''' is a German unofficial text-adventure which covers the events in the ''[[The Hobbit]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo interactivo"/> It was written in the computer language ''BASIC''.<ref name="El Anillo interactivo"/>
